HTML5: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web.
CSS3: CSS is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.
REACT: React is a front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components.
JS: JavaScript is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web.
NODE: Node.js is a back-end JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
SASS: Sass is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into CSS.
GIT: Git is software for tracking changes in any set of files.
MONGO: MongoDB is a document-oriented database program.
